# title

**Instance Property**

The localized string to use as the button title for the action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var title: String? { get }
```

## Getting the action information

- **identifier**: The string that you use internally to identify the action.

items.description: The string that you use internally to identify the action.
items.name: identifier

title: title
